headlines.description: Bologna's Musa Juwara and Musa Barrow scored in the last 20 minutes as the 10-man visitors hit back for an unlikely 2-1 win at Inter Milan.
headlines.shortLinkText: 10-man Bologna shock Inter's slim title hopes

headlines.description: Atalanta continued their winning streak with a 1-0 win at 10-man Cagliari on Sunday but only after the Sardinians had a goal disallowed.
headlines.shortLinkText: Atalanta win again after handball rule reaches new extreme

headlines.description: Napoli captain Lorenzo Insigne curled in a late goal to give them a 2-1 win at home to AS Roma.
headlines.shortLinkText: Insigne curls in late winner for Napoli against Roma
